articles.author: Darryn Bonthuys
articles.title: Prime Day: Best Gaming Keyboard Deals - GameSpot
articles.description: Whether you're in the market for an ultra-thin keyboard or a hefty slab of aluminum and Cherry MX keys, Prime Day has plenty of keyboards on sale.
articles.content: GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

articles.title: No Man's Sky's Worlds update adds walking houses, fancier weather and a touch of Starship Troopers - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: No Man's Sky is getting a big new Worlds update which treats the space sim's gazillions of planets to a sumptuous overh…
articles.content: No Man's Sky is getting a big new Worlds update which treats the space sim's gazillions of planets to a sumptuous overhaul, using technology devised for stablemate fantasy sim Light No Fire, which on… [+2487 chars]
